scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run tsc:lint && npm run nx:many -- -t=build --skip-nx-cache=true
scripts.lint: npm run tsc:lint && npm run nx:many -- -t=lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run tsc:lint && npm run nx:many -- -t=lint --fix
scripts.generate: npm run nx:many -- -t=generate --skip-nx-cache=true && npm run make-ts-list && npm run lint:fix
scripts.manual:prepare: npm run generate && npm run build && npm run docs:infrastructure && npm run test

serve:dev: Running NestJS application source code in watch mode
serve:dev:app-name: Running app-name source code in watch mode
start: Launching a built NestJS application (you must first build it using the build command)
start:prod:app-name: Launching a built app-name (you must first build it using the build command)
pm2:start: Launch all applications in PM2 mode
pm2:stop: Stop all applications in PM2 mode
docs:infrastructure: Creation of documentation for the entire infrastructure and creation of files necessary to launch the infrastructure
test: Running tests across the entire project
lint: Checking the typescript code for the entire project
lint:fix: Checking the typescript code throughout the project and trying to fix everything possible
generate: Running the "generate" nx command in applications and libraries which can be customized at your discretion
automatically generating an index.ts file for each library
checking the code and trying to fix it
tsc: Alias for running the tsc version locally, which is in the project (example: `npm run tsc -- --noEmit -p tsconfig.base.json`),
in order not to install tsc globally in the operating system
nx: Alias for running the nx version locally, which is in the project (example: `npm run nx -- dep-graph`),
in order not to install nx globally in the operating system
dep-graph: Generating dependency diagrams for nx applications and libraries
nx:many: Alias for running many nx commands (example: `npm run nx:many -- -t=lint`),
an exception has been added for the root project,
since sometimes an attempt to run an nx command on it can lead to the command freezing
make-ts-list: Automatically generating an index.ts file for each library,
works only for nx applications created using the `--projectNameAndRootFormat=as-provided` flag
manual:prepare: Preparing code, building code, creating infrastructure documentation
and all the files necessary to raise the infrastructure and running tests (generate, build, docs:infrastructure, test)
rucken: Alias for console tools and scripts for nx and not only use to automate the workflow and
speed up the development process (example: `npm run rucken -- make-ts-list`, site: https://www.npmjs.com/package/rucken)
